section.title: Introduction
section.p: This guide is more of a chapter zero for many excellent. It goes into the "need to know" and "fundamental concepts" that you need to be proficient to effectively start writing code.
There are many other books that go in depth into the specifics how these things work, but they do not necessarily cover the common pitfalls.
Hopefully this gives you insight into how people actually write code and what you can expect from the journey ahead.
